display_long_description:
Draw The Line revolutionizes the classic "Draw a line" mobile game by bringing it into a 3D realm. This innovative mixed reality game offers intellectually stimulating "Draw-to-Win" puzzle challenges, seamlessly blends the familiar drawing mechanic with immersive 3D environments, creating a gaming experience that's both refreshingly new and engagingly challenging. In Draw The Line, you will

- Act as a mischievous magic artist, use magic brush to create physic-based magical touches to solve seemingly impossible challenges, with a simple yet captivating gameplay mechanics.

- Solve a wide variety of levels and challenges, including 200+ exquisitely designed levels, 10+ distinctive composition modules, different types of drawing materials with unique physics properties.

- Immerse yourself in an effortlessly learnable and delightfully playable experience with a charming art style and soothing music. Supports MR see through and hand-tracking game control.

Can you draw the magic line and solve the puzzles?
